docs.text: Welcome to PM-Toolbox documentation! Code and documentation Installation Quick start Contributing Authors and citation License Acknowledgements
docs.title: Home

docs.text: PM-Toolbox tutorials PM-Toolbox functionality is illustrated in the following notebooks. Imaging module How to convert DICOM into NRRD, check ROI segmentation, extract the radiomic features, and explore the imaging parameters. Features module How to visualize features distribution in classes, plot the feature correlation matrix, check Mann-Whitney U-test p-values, plot univariate ROC (and calculate AUC) for each feature, perform volumetric analysis, and save all the scores.
